data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gkrUCD-KGEoQ7kNvgF-lY1g&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9qW-DNI9fJUkwyjnZQb_TtGlNSN1EzTXGYybeL-rGGA&oe=667AA837)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BtB6bZujy3sQ7kNvgGCcClk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_HQwl7ubhF3l2PBBK1xHiZ_tvxAfsMFOyfc67GZlP9g&oe=667AB5D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ffwesReqJRQQ7kNvgGKqYpj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAHis-HOMZ-0RnoQB2Uexv7t-iPLHcn7jcS2Myetq8upA&oe=667AA109)
